a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (11:38): It doesn't look like he even thought his ideas through...

f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (11:38): hmm. why does the URI to the blog entry call it "...opera-9-5-alpha-3", but the it's only alpha 1? http://my.opera.com/desktopteam/blog/2007/09/04/go-and-get-opera-9-5-alpha-3
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:39): he should read the spec, there are method restrictions, there are restrictions on availability of readyState, etc.
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (11:40): f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220: Maybe they messed up the post two times before getting it right :D

f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (11:44): oh nice, they finally fixed this bug "No longer use font-variant: small-caps for acronym elements". I wondered how long they would remain inconsistent with other browsers on that
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (11:46): cool, text-shadow support
0da07476c4bd14079ce4032a6f280e17 (11:47): 65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c: something not immediatly evident: We support multiple text shadows, comma-separated
0da07476c4bd14079ce4032a6f280e17 (11:47): I think the limit is at something like 12 shadows
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (11:47): our limit is one shadow
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (11:47): f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220: http://html5.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/tables/
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (11:48): cause that was easier to implement with high performance, and more than one shadow seemed useless
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (11:48): 0da07476c4bd14079ce4032a6f280e17 had some crazy use case for 8, I think :)
0da07476c4bd14079ce4032a6f280e17 (11:49): I used Opera as a rendering engine for some PNG
0da07476c4bd14079ce4032a6f280e17 (11:49): instead of torturing myself with GIMP

65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (11:51): how dare you speak for the HTML working group!

f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (12:08): I have to press '/' to activate it. I want it to start finding as soon as I start typing, like I have it configured in FF
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (12:11): How does that interact with one-key shortcuts, though?
